FontString.name: $parentLabel
FontString.text: This placeholders are available: $h = Hour in 24h format, $t = Hour in 12h format, $m = Minute, $s = Second, $p = AM / PM. You can use html color codes like #FF0000. If you want to toggle of the timestamp then just leav this textbox empty.

Scripts.OnClick: if( SCCN_ts_format ~= getglobal( "ChatMOD_TimestampBox" ):GetText() ) then solColorChatNicks_SlashCommand("timestamp "..getglobal( "ChatMOD_TimestampBox" ):GetText()); end SCCNConfigForm:Hide();
